ui.settings-view.timeout-tooltip: The amount of time in minutes to wait before cancelling requests.
ui.settings-view.advanced-settings-warni: Only change these settings if you know what they mean.
ui.settings-view.client-id-tooltip: The Client ID to be used to call the Drive API
ui.settings-view.client-secret-tooltip: The Client Secret to be used to call the Drive API
ui.settings-view.refresh-token-tooltip: The refresh token to be used when calling the Drive API
messages.settings-view-model.platform-no: Platform not supported, please enter the details manually.
messages.settings-view-model.complete-au: Complete the authentication in the browser
messages.settings-view-model.failed-open: Couldn't open the url in your browser, copied the url to your clipboard.
messages.settings-view-model.failed-retr: An error occured while retrieving the code, check the logs for more information.
messages.settings-view-model.query-no-co: Couldn't finish the authentication process because the the api didn't return a code.
messages.settings-view-model.failed-get-: An error occured while retrieving the token response, check the logs for more information.
messages.settings-view-model.failed-auth: Couldn't finish the authentication process because the the api didn't return a token.
messages.settings-view-model.invalid-tim: Invalid timeout, please enter a valid number.
